name: Amplemind
description: Amplemind is an app development-focused technology agency based in Guadalajara, Mexico with offices at San Francisco and Culiacán, Sinaloa too. We're a nimble, multi-disciplinary team that works seamlessly with Agencies and Startups who are looking for senior developers and technology professionals to help them tackle their backlog of product ambitions.  We specialize in mobile apps and responsive websites.
